amendment.description: To fund improvements in border and interior security by assessing a $500 supplemental fee under title VI.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4127 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 25. Record Vote Number: 146.

action.text: Amendment SA 4127 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S5063-5066, S5091-5092; text: CR S5063) To fund improvements in border and interior security by assessing a $500 supplemental fee under title VI.
